name: Ordnance Storage
desc: Reduces cargo capacity by %s and increases the monthly maintenance supply cost by %s.
sModDesc: Reduces ordinance cost of Ballistic and Missile weapons by %s depending on size.

name: Flux Capacitor
desc: Reduces cargo capacity by %s and increases the monthly maintenance supply cost by %s.
sModDesc: Reduces ordinance cost of Energy weapons by %s depending on size.

name: Blockade Runner
desc:
Allows the Zero-Flux speed boost to take effect at up to %s flux.

Reduces High Explosive damage taken by hull and armour by %s.
sModDesc:
Increases Zero-Flux speed boost by %s.

%s burn speed.

name: Converted Cargo Bay
desc: This ship's cargo hold has been converted to house a pair of fighter bays.

name: Phase Resonator
desc:
%s deals hard flux damage to shields.

Increases phase-time bonus by %s.

name: Dedicated Shield Generator
desc:
Installs a dedicated omni-shield generator on the ship. The shield has a %s degree arc.

The shield generator draws power from engines and reduces the ship's top speed by %s.

name: Engine specialists
desc:
In order to avoid blockade patrols Ko Combine engineers are trained to push their engines to their limits. Their ability to rapidly restore engine functions during combat situations makes them harder to catch during a pursuit.

%s faster engine repair speed during combat.

name: Phase Hazing
desc:
As part of their training Mbaye-Gogol recruits are expected to undergo a controversial number of rapid phase-shifts. Those that don't drop out are better able to maintain their composure in almost any situation.

Reduces the rate at which combat readiness degrades by %s.
%s fewer crew casualties from hull damage sustained in combat.

name: Eridani Targetting Modifications
desc: Increases base range of Energy weapons by %s.
